Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This product, which has been meticulously crafted and tailored to perfection, is priced at $20000. I believe its exceptional quality and craftsmanship warrant this investment, and I am confident it will bring you significant benefits and satisfaction. Should you choose to accept this offer, I assure you of a seamless transaction and excellent customer service. If you need more information or have any questions, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $20,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $20,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
